original_text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate, as thou art in the way, give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him; lest he hale thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and the officer cast thee into prison.
korean_text: 네가 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 법관에게 갈 때에 길에서 화해하기를 힘쓰라 그가 너를 재판장에게 끌어 가고 재판장이 너를 옥졸에게 넘겨 주어 옥졸이 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너의 대적과 재판관에게 갈 때에

sentences.original_text: as thou art in the way
give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him
lest he hale thee to the judge
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너를 재판장에게 끌고 가지 않도록

sentences.original_text: and the judge deliver thee to the officer
and the officer cast thee into prison
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 관리가 너를 감옥에 던지지 않도록
